summary: This document is an internal communication from the Metropolitan Correctional Center regarding pending inmate moves, specifically discussing the placement of Jeffrey Epstein into general population and the placement of inmate Tartaglione. It requests discussion of compatible cell mates for both inmates.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as an inmate who will be placed in general population at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, with tentative placement on either 7-South or 7-North.

persons.name: Tartaglione
persons.context: Inmate Tartaglione is mentioned as another inmate who will be placed on 11-North in the near future, with a request to discuss a compatible cell mate.

persons.name: Captain
persons.context: The document appears to be from or addressed to a Captain at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, as indicated by the signature line.

events.title: Pending Inmate Moves at MCC
events.description: The document discusses pending moves for inmates Epstein and Tartaglione at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, including placing Epstein in general population and Tartaglione on 11-North.

locations.address: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
locations.description: The federal detention facility where Jeffrey Epstein and inmate Tartaglione were held.
Potential housing units within the Metropolitan Correctional Center where Epstein was tentatively to be placed.
The housing unit within the Metropolitan Correctional Center where inmate Tartaglione was to be placed.

keyFacts: The document indicates that Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled to be moved into general population at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
Epstein's tentative placement was on either 7-South or 7-North, requiring discussion of a compatible cell mate.
Another inmate, Tartaglione, was also scheduled for a move to 11-North, with similar cell mate considerations.
The correspondence is an internal communication from the Metropolitan Correctional Center regarding inmate management.
